Chemical Actions and Uses/Pharmacologic Actions/Physiological Effects of Drugs/Neurotransmitter Agents/Neurotransmitter Uptake Inhibitors/Dopamine Uptake Inhibitors
Record.Description: Drugs that block the transport of DOPAMINE into axon terminals or into storage vesicles within terminals. Most of the ADRENERGIC UPTAKE INHIBITORS also inhibit dopamine uptake.
